name: Lever Simulator - Multiplayer
description:
Embark on this unique experience as you take control of your character's hands using two mouse controllers. One mouse guides the left hand, while the other directs the other, offering a unique and engaging gameplay mechanic that challenges your coordination skills.



Engage with a diverse range of levers and buttons to masterfully command intricate machinery within the game.



Explore multiple game modes, each presenting distinctive mechanics and challenges that will keep you hooked and entertained.

Future Content

Look forward to a continuous stream of free exhilarating content updates. The possibilities are boundless, with upcoming game modes such as piloting planes, navigating construction vehicles in chaotic scenarios, underwater adventures with submarines, high-speed kart races, and epic space battles.
